title: Rick Stein's Food Stories
overview: Rick searches for the answer to one big question: how is British culinary culture evolving in the 21st century?From The Lake District to Argyll, Belfast to The Gower Peninsula, Bristol to Yorkshire and many other incredible locations, Rick will meet the pioneers of the British food scene. From those perfecting traditional dishes like the great Yorkshire pud to the chefs and producers bringing new flavours and tastes from across the globe. Then, from his own home in beloved Cornwall, Rick shares his favourite dishes - the ones he think should have a place in our nation's cook book.
